title: Must watch!
selftext:
“In Delhi, vehicles are worst offenders when it comes to pollution”

“Road accidents kill 422 Indians everyday whilst homicides just 82”

“Tyre emissions is more polluting than tail-pipe emissions, rendering electric vehicles redundant”

“An important conversation to begin having with our friends and family.”
